verses.samhita: namOq hira#Nya bAhavE sEnAqnyE# diqSAMcaq pata#yEq namOq namO# vRuqkShEByOq hari#kESEByaH paSUqnAM pata#yEq namOq nama#H saqspi~jja#rAyaq tviShI#matE pathIqnAM pata#yEq namOq namO# baBluqSAya# vivyAqdhinE-&nnA#nAMq pata#yEq namOq namOq hari#kESAyO-pavIqtinE# puqShTAnAMq pata#yEq namOq namO# Baqvasya# hEqtyai jaga#tAMq pata#yEq namOq namO# ruqdrAyA#-tatAqvinEq kShEtrA#NAMq pata#yEq namOq namaH# sUqtAyA-ha#ntyAyaq vanA#nAMq pata#yEq namOq namOq - [  ] 5

rOhi#tAya sthaqpata#yE vRuqkShANAMq pata#yEq namOq namO# maqntriNE# vANiqjAyaq kakShA#NAMq pata#yEq namOq namO# BuvaqntayE# vArivaskRuqtA-yauSha#dhInAMq pata#yEq namOq nama# uqccai-rGO#ShAyA kraqndaya#tE pattIqnAM pata#yEq namOq nama#H kRuthsnavIqtAyaq dhAva#tEq sattva#nAMq pata#yEq nama#H || 6
